name: Deep Gnome (Svirfneblin)
description: A small humanoid with earthy skin tones, a subtle gnome's features, wearing a chain shirt. Often seen in rocky environments.
memorable: Possesses innate spellcasting abilities and is incredibly stealthy in rocky terrain.
goals: To explore, gather knowledge and defend their home against threats.
relations: May encounter other gnomes, underground creatures, or members of the Underdark factions.
environment: Typically found in the Underdark, especially in rocky areas.
strengths: Advantage on stealth checks in rocky terrain and saving throws against magic.
weaknesses: Lower Charisma may hinder social interactions.
attacks: Uses a war pick or poisoned darts to deal piercing damage and inflict poison.
most_powerful_ability: Innate spellcasting allows access to spells like blindness/deafness and nondetection.
equipment: Wields a war pick and carries poisoned darts.
skills: Skilled in Investigation and Stealth, making it adept at hiding and searching.
additional_information: Stone Camouflage for hiding in rocky terrain
Advantage on certain saving throws against magic
Can cast several utility spells innately
spellcasting: Can cast nondetection at will and has other spells available once per day.
test_queries: gnome with poison darts and camouflage
magical stealthy gnome in rocky areas
creature that can become unseen in rocks
